sentence.Network_en: His drinking led him to a life of destitution.
He reach the excess of destitution from which he never rose again.
sentence.Network_cn: 他走到了贫困的极端,从此一蹶不振.

entry.def: Destitution is the state of having no money or possessions.

means.word_mean: 1. a state without friends or money or prospects
